attributes.action: Ban Karine Bassett from using a computer and making contact with any human beings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Karine Bassett is a complete moron. She is someone who tried to start a petition to ban all motorsports, an industry that is relied upon to provide thousands of jobs around the world and entertainment for millions. It also provides important development of safety features to be used on modern road cars such as ABS,traction control,and crash cells. without motorsport these features would be years behind in development and more would die needlessly on the roads

rejection.details: We suggest you reword your petition to present a different call for action on motorsports which is within the remit of the Prime Minister of Government. For more guidance, please see the terms and conditions for Number 10 petitions: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/terms
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
